overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
HEIC to PDF Converter is a free online tool that converts HEIC images taken on iPhone or iPad to PDF format.
 HEIC is the standard image format for Apple products, but it often lacks compatibility with Windows and various web services. Converting to PDF makes printing, sending, and saving significantly smoother.
 This conversion tool is registration-free, completely free to use, and designed with simplicity in mind - accessible from both smartphones and PCs.

steps.description: Once converted, save your PDF using the "Download" button and use it right away.

questions.question: Q1. What is HEIC format?
questions.answer: A. HEIC is a high-compression, high-quality image format used by Apple devices when taking photos. It cannot be displayed in some environments like Windows.

questions.question: Q2. Can I combine multiple images into one PDF?
questions.answer: A. Yes, you can upload multiple HEIC files and convert them into a single combined PDF.

questions.question: Q3. Will my HEIC images lose quality?
questions.answer: A. We convert your images while maintaining the original resolution and quality as much as possible.

questions.question: Q4. Can I use this on my smartphone?
questions.answer: A. Yes, you can use this service from any browser on iPhone, Android, or other smartphones.

questions.question: Q5. Are my uploaded images stored on your server?
questions.answer: A. No, all uploaded files are automatically deleted after conversion and are not stored on our servers. Your privacy is protected.
